wiki.content:
Yesterdays is a single and third track on the Guns N' Roses album Use Your Illusion II. It was written by Axl Rose, West Arkeen, Del James and Billy McCloud. This song is featured in the 2004 compilation Greatest Hits.
 
 There was a video made for the song. Filmed in black and white, the video mixes clips of the band playing in an empty warehouse and photographs of band members during the Use Your Illusion Tour. It is included on the Welcome to the Videos DVD. Another version was also made, which just contained the band playing in the warehouse. The song peaked at #72 on The Billboard Hot 100
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Yesterdays is a single and third track on the Guns N' Roses album Use Your Illusion II. It was written by Axl Rose, West Arkeen, Del James and Billy McCloud. This song is featured in the 2004 compilation Greatest Hits.  There was a video made for the song. Filmed in black and white, the video mixes clips of the band playing in an empty warehouse and photographs of band members during the Use Your Illusion Tour. It is included on the Welcome to the Videos DVD. Another version was also made, which just contained the band playing in the warehouse.

track.name: Yesterdays
comments: So poignant and precise, every little detail here is contagious. YES-TAH-DYYAAAAYAAAH
did someone just say they would trade slash? oh god. [3]
Gr8 track!!! GnR was so bad ass at their peak!!!! i agree with ya gdcman BUT i'm sorry i'd never trade Slash and his talents for Bubblefoot.regardless of how loose they were live.
did someone just say they would trade slash? oh god. [2]
did someone just say they would trade slash? oh god.
i love this song, i love GNR
Ooohh, Axl's voice <3 And all their beautiful hairr :D I love Guns N Roses!

Gr8 track!!! GnR was so bad ass at their peak!!!!  They are better now. Now they don't butcher every song live like they used to becuase they have top notch musicians. I'll trade you my Slash GnR pick for a Bumblefoot GnR pick in a second. Who is up for the trade?
"Some things could be better if we'd all just let them be." *-*
